versions.jobDescription:
Node and Python for Backend, Vue for frontend.
Dashboard creation, matching vendors-customers plantform, heavy backend,
versions.notes:
Emphasize my product mindset, stakeholder management, project/product management. Emphasize my backend skills primarily Node in start ups and Python for Data heavy ops and AI, profficiency Backend, typescript, react and Vue for frontend, tanstack, next js, 
What I will be doing in my desired job at keelvar: Dashboard creation, matching vendors-customers plantform, heavy backend. Add some AWS and infra that they maybe using, not like im an expert, but strong familiiarity with them.
Make sure you stick to current length, make only changes that substitute the curernt content, without making it longer than it is

resumeData.summary: Product-minded Senior Engineer with 8+ years of experience driving technical execution and delivering business value. Expertise in backend development (Node.js, Python) and full-stack capabilities (React, Next.js, Vue). Focused on building data-driven products and matching platform solutions.

education.degree: Advanced React, Next.js, & System Architecture paths

interests.title: Mensa International
interests.description: Member & active collaborator

interests.title: AI & Data Products
interests.description: Currently developing AI-powered tools using modern LLM APIs and vector databases

interests.title: Technical Specialties
interests.description: PostgreSQL Database Design & Optimization • Python Data Processing & ETL Pipelines • Docker Containerization & CI/CD • System Integration & API Design • Team Leadership & Code Review Processes • React/Next.js Frontend Architecture

achievements: Engineered Self-Serve Booking Engine with Stripe webhook integration, automated invoicing, and dynamic pricing algorithms for €30k/month revenue
Built algorithmic tenant qualification system using Python pandas for data analysis and machine learning scoring models, reducing manual operations 90%
Architected data consolidation system with custom APIs integrating Notion, Airtable, and Monday.com into unified PostgreSQL database with real-time sync
Created vector databases using pgvector extension for semantic search and AI-powered property recommendations with OpenAI embeddings
Built Idealista-style property website with Mapbox GL integration, advanced filtering, and responsive design using Tailwind CSS
Designed intelligent matchmaking system analyzing user compatibility through JSON schema validation and recommendation algorithms
Built scalable React applications with Redux Toolkit, React Query for server state management, and optimized bundle splitting for UK/US enterprise clients
Implemented comprehensive CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions, Docker multi-stage builds, and automated deployment to AWS ECS with blue-green strategy
Developed high-performance frontend architectures using Webpack 5 module federation, lazy loading, and service workers for offline-first PWA functionality
Integrated GraphQL APIs using Apollo Client, implemented caching strategies, optimistic updates, and real-time subscriptions for enhanced UX
Engineered high-performance 3D data visualization with 60fps rendering
Built component architecture for rapid Real Estate product prototyping
Implemented WebGL/Three.js solutions for complex geospatial data rendering
Optimized massive dataset handling and real-time visualization performance
Developed regulatory-compliant interfaces for financial risk analysis
Built production systems serving 20k+ B2B customers with 100% uptime
